department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: a requirement from the Department of National Defence
full_summary:
### Department of National Defence (DND) Requests Standing Offer for Automotive Radiator and Air Conditioner Repairs

#### Tender Reference
WS4094072554-Doc4098145221

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Procurement Category
SRV (Service)

#### Tender Type
Request for Standing Offer (Demande d'Offre à Commandes)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

#### Procurement Timeframe
The tender closing date was **August 16, 2023, at 14:00**.

#### Requirement Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND), 8 Wing Trenton, Trenton, Ontario, seeks a contractor to provide automotive radiator and/or air conditioner repairs on an as-and-when-required basis. The requirement may include supply of all labour, parts, and equipment necessary for these repairs.

#### Key Dates
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2026

#### Canadian Content Preference
The contract preference is given to Canadian services.

#### Regions of Delivery
The work will take place in Ontario, except for the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16878263?extsite=MTY4NzgyNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information
* Also available in French
* **Name**: Vashti Ramnarine (SPAC/PSPC) (HRPRoulette Points format)
* **Email**: vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not provided
* **Address**: Not provided
